html: The next step toward the restoration of Jehovah’s people is for them to gain an awareness of who they are—of their true identity as covenant people of the God of Israel. Once they “recognize,” “believe,” and “perceive” that their restoration was foretold by prophets, and that now is the time of its implementation, they may resume their role as Jehovah’s collective “servant” or vassal and become “witnesses” of his truth ( Isaiah 44:6-8; 45:20-22). Their very restoration as his people serves as proof that Jehovah alone—not the nations, their leaders, or their gods—is their God ( Isaiah 45:4-6; 60:10-16).
